document.masterDocTitle: The bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the Ukraine, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The bees of the genus Colletes Latreille 1802 of the Ukraine, with a key to species (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae)

bibRefCitation.author: Eversmann
bibRefCitation.refString: Eversmann, E. (1852) Fauna Hymenopterologica Volgo-Uralensis. Bulletin de la Imperiale Society d'Naturalistes de Moscou, 25 (2), 3 - 137.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Colletes hylaeiformis
Eversmann 1852
: 45
, Ƥ, 3 ( type locality: Kasan, Orenburg, Russia ).
Colletes chobauti
Pérez 1903
: 229
, Ƥ, 3 ( type locality: Avignon, France ).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 5. a.
Colletes graeffei Alfken
, male: scutellum; b.
C. punctatus Mocsary
, female: metanotum and propodeum in lateral view; c.
C. cunicularius (Linnaeus)
, female: facial fovea; d.
C. carinatus Radoszkowski
, male: metasomal S5 with lateral hair patch; e.
C. inexpectatus Noskiewicz
, male: metasomal S5 with lateral hair tuft; f.
C. collaris Dours
, male: metasomal S6 with pair of apical grooves. Scale bar: 1 mm.

Distribution in Ukraine (
Fig. 3
b).
Ivano-Frankivsk Prov., Ternopil Prov., Odessa Prov., Cherkasy Prov., Kirovohrad Prov., Poltava Prov., Crimea, Kharkiv Prov., Luhansk Prov., Donetsk Prov., Zaporizhia Prov.

General distribution. Spain , France , Germany , Austria , Italy , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Slovenia , Romania , Bulgaria , Greece , Turkey , Ukraine , Georgia , Azerbaijan , Tajikistan .
